Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core
Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type

Interface IItemType

All Known Subinterfaces:
IArrayTest, IAtomicOrUnionType<I>, IKindTest<T>, IMapTest
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAtomicOrUnionType, gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.AbstractItemType, DataTypeItemType
public interface IItemType
Provides type information that be used to discover type information for, test, and cast various item objects.

A variety of static methods are provided that can be used to generate tests that compare an item's actual type against an expectation.

    • map

      @NonNull static IMapTest map(@NonNull IAtomicOrUnionType<?> key, @NonNull ISequenceType value)
      Get a new kind test that matches any map item whose keys and values match the provided atomic type and sequence type respectively.
      Parameters:
      key - the expected atomic type of the map's key
      value - the sequence test to use to check the map's contents
      Returns:
      the map test

    • assembly

      @NonNull static IKindTest<IAssemblyNodeItem> assembly()
      Matches any IAssemblyNodeItem regardless of its name or type.
      Returns:
      the test

    • assembly

      @NonNull static IKindTest<IAssemblyNodeItem> assembly(@NonNull IEnhancedQName instanceName, @Nullable String typeName, @NonNull StaticContext staticContext)
      Get a new kind test that matches a IAssemblyNodeItem with the provided name and a type matching the provided name of a specific assembly definition.

      If used as part of a document kind test, the the provided instanceName will match the root assembly name of the document's root.

      Parameters:
      instanceName - the name of the assembly root definition or instance to match depending on the use context
      typeName - the name of the assembly definition to match
      staticContext - the static context in which the test was declared
      Returns:
      the test

    • assembly

      @NonNull static IKindTest<IAssemblyNodeItem> assembly(@NonNull String typeName, @NonNull StaticContext staticContext)
      Get a new kind test that matches an IAssemblyNodeItem with any name and a type matching the provided name of a specific assembly definition.
      Parameters:
      typeName - the name of the assembly definition to match
      staticContext - the static context in which the test was declared
      Returns:
      the test

      Parameters:

      staticContext - the static context in which the test was declared

      Matches any IFlagNodeItem with the provided name and type matching the provided name of a specific globally-scoped flag definition.
      Parameters:
      instanceName - the name of the flag instance to match
      typeName - the name of the flag definition or value type to match
      staticContext - the static context in which the test was declared
      Returns:
      the test

      Test if the provided item matches this item type.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the item matches the expectations or false otherwise
